column5: Hi All,  Got a DJI Mavic for my 50th Birthday.........   SERIOUSLY cool gizmo!
cool and wait, you're 50?!?!   Yeah....50....in a week....how the hell did that happen!!!!
Yeah....50....in a week....how the hell did that happen!!!! Blink again and you're 55. ..
I was just looking at one of those lastnight on Amazon!   Awesome!!   Can't wait to see some vids.
Very cool! My birthday is coming up in just over a week too...I have a few more to get to 50 though old man haha   S.
Me too! My last appointment in tbay I had to check out best buy. Holy moly some of these drones are $$$  Simon always comes through! Can't wait for the footy!!!
Cool toy Simon. Hows she fly? Is it hard?

cool. so, hook a release clip to the bottom, snap in your line and have to drone run it to that spot just too far to cast, or under that tree , give a tug on the line and plop. perfect placement every time.
Cool toy Simon. Hows she fly? Is it hard?  Not really, pretty basic, but you get get very complicated, jack is seven and he flew it today no props in beginner mode.
